ti:work.ti:title: De Facie Quae in orbe Lunae Apparet

ti:translation.ti:label: Concerning the Face which Appears in the Orb Of the Moon
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. XII. Cherniss, Harold and William Clark Helmbold translators. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press. London: William Heinemann Ltd. 1957 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: Of the Face Appearing Within the Orb Of the Moon

ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ τοῦ ἐμφαινομένου προσώπου τῷ κύκλῳ τῆς σελήνης
